messages.title: BUILD A BRIGHTER FUTURE
messages.content: Brexit will hit the poorest, hardest. Dan has been campaigning to stay in the EU since he was elected to serve as Leeds West representative. Social needs are not addressed, and lack of social support means Brexit is endangering the NHS, workers' rights, and investment in public services. Housing, Transport and support to Remain in the EU are shared more fairly.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Stop Brexit on day one and continue to ensure social needs and services are addressed.
Work with the EU to enforce high environmental standards and protect our planet. Aim to build Britain into a global green economy.
EU Citizens make a huge contribution to our NHS, schools and care services. Aim to retain the vital staff and offer the right to live, work, study and retire across Europe.
Invest in our NHS & schools, and build a better politics, making the country fairer for everyone.

issues.brexitEurope: Brexit will hit the poorest, hardest. The Conservatives' botched handling of Brexit has driven away thousands of healthcare workers in our NHS.
issues.economy: Additionally, we must push for radical devolution to the regions, including Yorkshire, so that power is spread out from Westminster. Rebuild our economy and invest in our NHS & schools.
issues.environment: Work with the EU to enforce high environmental standards and protect our planet. Aim to build Britain into a global green economy.
issues.health: The Conservatives' botched handling of Brexit has driven away thousands of healthcare workers in our NHS.
issues.immigration: EU Citizens make a huge contribution to our NHS, schools and care services. We aim to retain the vital staff and offer the right to live, work, study and retire across Europe.
issues.labourEmployment: Remember: Dan has been working at the University of Leeds for ten years.
issues.transport: Invest in public services, including transportation.

leaflet.personalStatement: Dan Walker has served as Leeds West representative and has been campaigning for Remain since 2016.

images.caption: Dan Walker campaigning for Leeds West

examples: In 1 in 10 NHS doctors are EU citizens, along with 13,000 nurses.
